dcterms:creator: A. Cybulska
P. Vossen
dcterms:description: The ECB+ corpus is an extension of the Event Coreference Bank (ECB) consisting of documents from Google News clustered into topics and annotated for event coreference. It increases the difficulty level of the original ECB dataset by adding a second set of documents for each topic, discussing different events of the same type.
dcterms:title: ECB+ corpus

dcterms:creator: A. Cybulska
P. Vossen
dcterms:description: The Event Coreference Bank (ECB) is the original dataset from which the ECB+ corpus is derived. It is designed for event coreference resolution tasks.
dcterms:title: Event Coreference Bank (ECB)

dcterms:creator: A. Eirew
A. Cattan
I. Dagan
dcterms:description: The Wikipedia Events Coreference (WEC) dataset is derived from Wikipedia and is designed for cross-document event coreference resolution tasks.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia Events Coreference (WEC)
